title: Wearable technology market share in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014 , by product
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.
The maximum Share of market 39.0 is found at Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and the minimum is found at Smart watches where Wearable technology products is 11.0.
There is a difference of 28.0 between the maximum Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and minimum Wearable technology products Smart watches.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of market for 4 number of Wearable technology productss.
